creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund and Gift of funds from Thirza Cleveland and Joan Wurtele
description: black and white checked waist band with nineteen cloth bands hanging from it; each band is divided into four distinct plant or animal designs embroidered; field colors include light and dark blue, green, red and yellow; three groups of fringe are attached to each band; blue backing on bands
dimension: 24 3/4 x 40 5/8 in. (62.87 x 103.2 cm) (without ties and fringe)
title: Miao Woman's Skirt
